comment.body:
As far as I understand, there is something like:
```js
if (300 > $('.pb_t')['next']()['offset']()['top']) { /* adblock */ }
```
It checks [offset top](https://api.jquery.com/offset/) of `#prg` element (`$('.pb_t')['next']()`).
jQuery `.offset()` method seems to be using `getBoundingClientRect()` method.
This:
```adblock
telsu.fi#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'Element.prototype.getBoundingClientRect', 'noopCallbackFunc')
```
seems to works, though something might be broken if `getBoundingClientRect()` is used in other functions.

comment.body:
>so with [$domain=] rule could you add the filters to Turkish filters? These banners and 3rd party redirected ads:

Okay, I have added:
```adblock
[$domain=/(^\|.+\.)selcuksportshd\d+\.xyz/]##.footer
[$domain=/(^\|.+\.)selcuksportshd\d+\.xyz/]##.socials a:is(.meritroyal, .iptv, .streamradar)
```

<hr>

>this rule does not appear in the Filtering log, but it's working

As far as I know, scriptlets without domain are not displayed in the filtering intentionally.

<hr>

>AdGuard Turkish filter in-video rule not working properly with Firefox and uBO:
Why this happens?

To be honest, I do not know.

issue.title: Some Google's domains used for ads/tracking to be blocked (Missed ads/tracking)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Public Plain DNS (Default servers)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, other (specify in comment below), the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites and apps

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Here are some Google's domains used for serving ads or for tracking that aren't currently blocked by AdGuard Public DNS: Some of them seem to only be contacted by mobile apps.

```
analytics-api-samples.googlecode.com
video-stats.video.google.com
www.googleadservices.com
domains.googlesyndication.com
www.googletagservices.com
ads.google.com
afs.googlesyndication.com
mobileads.google.com
video-ad-stats.googlesyndication.com
adservice.google.com
googletagmanager.com
www.googletagmanager.com
mobileads.google.com
mail-ads.google.com
pagead.l.doubleclick.net
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Out of those 15 domains, only `googletagmanager.com` can be seen in AdGuard's "[exclusions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/master/Filters/exclusions.txt)" list, and only 
`www.googleadservices.com` and `pagead.l.doubleclick.net` can be seen in the "[exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/master/Filters/exceptions.txt)" list. All the others should be good to go.

However, it does not work on bihann.com. A blank screen appears when I tap on it. > > I checked the AdGuard filter to see if there was any difference between nehannn.com and bihann.com. As a result, I found the following rules only for nehannn.com. comment.body:
Hello, thanks for the detailed response. 
I can't reproduce the issue with the your settings (without user rules).

And for me it's enough to add these 2 exceptions to DNS user rules (along with non-filtering DNS server)
```
@@||doubleclick.net^
@@||googlesyndication.com^
```

There seem to be too many exceptions, are all of them necessary? 
```
in Tracking Protection filter
@@||google-analytics.com/analytics.js$domain=nehannn.com

in Japanese filter
@@||amazon-adsystem.com/aax2/apstag.js$domain=nehannn.com
@@||g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?$xmlhttprequest,domain=nehannn.com
@@||g.doubleclick.net/gpt/pubads_impl_$script,domain=nehannn.com
@@||g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=nehannn.com
@@||googlesyndication.com/pagead/managed/js/adsense/*/show_ads_impl_$script,domain=nehannn.com
@@||googlesyndication.com/safeframe/$subdocument,domain=nehannn.com
@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=nehannn.com
nehannn.com#@#[id^="google_ads_iframe"]
```
